deprecation.reason: Each server behaves differently. Use server specific properties instead.

properties.name: server.http2.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable HTTP/2 support, if the current environment supports it.

properties.name: server.max-http-post-size
properties.description: Maximum size in bytes of the HTTP post content.

deprecation.reason: Use dedicated property for each container.

properties.name: server.reactive.session.cookie.domain
properties.description: Domain for the cookie.

properties.name: server.reactive.session.cookie.http-only
properties.description: Whether to use "HttpOnly" cookies for the cookie.

properties.name: server.reactive.session.cookie.max-age
properties.description: Maximum age of the cookie. If a duration suffix is not specified, seconds will be used. A positive value indicates when the cookie expires relative to the current time. A value of 0 means the cookie should expire immediately. A negative value means no "Max-Age".

properties.name: server.reactive.session.cookie.name
properties.description: Name for the cookie.

properties.name: server.reactive.session.cookie.partitioned
properties.description: Whether the generated cookie carries the Partitioned attribute.

properties.name: server.reactive.session.cookie.path
properties.description: Path of the cookie.

properties.name: server.reactive.session.cookie.same-site
properties.description: SameSite setting for the cookie.

properties.name: server.reactive.session.cookie.secure
properties.description: Whether to always mark the cookie as secure.

properties.name: server.servlet.encoding.charset
properties.description: Charset of HTTP requests and responses. Added to the Content-Type header if not set explicitly.

properties.name: server.servlet.encoding.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable http encoding support.

properties.name: server.servlet.encoding.force
properties.description: Whether to force the encoding to the configured charset on HTTP requests and responses.

properties.name: server.servlet.encoding.force-request
properties.description: Whether to force the encoding to the configured charset on HTTP requests. Defaults to true when force has not been specified.

properties.name: server.servlet.encoding.force-response
properties.description: Whether to force the encoding to the configured charset on HTTP responses.

properties.name: server.servlet.jsp.class-name
properties.description:
Class name of the servlet to use for JSPs. If registered is true and this class
	 * is on the classpath then it will be registered.

properties.name: server.servlet.jsp.init-parameters
properties.description: Init parameters used to configure the JSP servlet.

properties.name: server.servlet.path
properties.description: Path of the main dispatcher servlet.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.comment
properties.description: Comment for the cookie.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.domain
properties.description: Domain for the cookie.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.http-only
properties.description: Whether to use "HttpOnly" cookies for the cookie.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.max-age
properties.description: Maximum age of the cookie. If a duration suffix is not specified, seconds will be used. A positive value indicates when the cookie expires relative to the current time. A value of 0 means the cookie should expire immediately. A negative value means no "Max-Age".

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.name
properties.description: Name of the cookie.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.partitioned
properties.description: Whether the generated cookie carries the Partitioned attribute.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.path
properties.description: Path of the cookie.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.same-site
properties.description: SameSite setting for the cookie.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.secure
properties.description: Whether to always mark the cookie as secure.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.persistent
properties.description: Whether to persist session data between restarts.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.store-dir
properties.description: Directory used to store session data.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.timeout
properties.description: Session timeout. If a duration suffix is not specified, seconds will be used.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.tracking-modes
properties.description: Session tracking modes.

properties.name: server.ssl.bundle
properties.description: Name of a configured SSL bundle.

properties.name: server.ssl.certificate
properties.description: Path to a PEM-encoded SSL certificate file.

properties.name: server.ssl.certificate-private-key
properties.description: Path to a PEM-encoded private key file for the SSL certificate.

properties.name: server.ssl.ciphers
properties.description: Supported SSL ciphers.

properties.name: server.ssl.client-auth
properties.description: Client authentication mode. Requires a trust store.

properties.name: server.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL support.

properties.name: server.ssl.enabled-protocols
properties.description: Enabled SSL protocols.

properties.name: server.ssl.key-alias
properties.description: Alias that identifies the key in the key store.

properties.name: server.ssl.key-password
properties.description: Password used to access the key in the key store.

properties.name: server.ssl.key-store
properties.description: Path to the key store that holds the SSL certificate (typically a jks file).

properties.name: server.ssl.key-store-password
properties.description: Password used to access the key store.

properties.name: server.ssl.key-store-provider
properties.description: Provider for the key store.

properties.name: server.ssl.key-store-type
properties.description: Type of the key store.

properties.name: server.ssl.protocol
properties.description: SSL protocol to use.

properties.name: server.ssl.server-name-bundles
properties.description: Mapping of host names to SSL bundles for SNI configuration.

properties.name: server.ssl.trust-certificate
properties.description: Path to a PEM-encoded SSL certificate authority file.

properties.name: server.ssl.trust-certificate-private-key
properties.description: Path to a PEM-encoded private key file for the SSL certificate authority.

properties.name: server.ssl.trust-store
properties.description: Trust store that holds SSL certificates.

properties.name: server.ssl.trust-store-password
properties.description: Password used to access the trust store.

properties.name: server.ssl.trust-store-provider
properties.description: Provider for the trust store.

properties.name: server.ssl.trust-store-type
properties.description: Type of the trust store.

properties.name: spring.application.admin.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable admin features for the application.

properties.name: spring.application.admin.jmx-name
properties.description: JMX name of the application admin MBean.

properties.name: spring.autoconfigure.exclude
properties.description: Auto-configuration classes to exclude.

properties.name: spring.git.properties
properties.description: Resource reference to a generated git info properties file.

properties.name: spring.threads.virtual.enabled
properties.description: Whether to use virtual threads.
